content: **knitted hat for men in drops daisy or drops karisma piece is knitted bottom up with stocking stitch rib and cables ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #cremecaramelhat drops design pattern da-049 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s/m - m/l l/xl head circumference 54/56 - 56/58 - 58/60 cm **yarn** drops daisy from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100-100 g colour 13 almond or use drops karisma from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100-150 g colour 91 almond **needles** drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm drops cable needle the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 22 stitches in width and 30 row vertically in stocking stitch on needle size 3 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm remember remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger sized needles or if you get too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller sized needles
